entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer round trips to domain controller to map client certificate to user when domain joined #78350
  • Dynamicaly loading "Microsoft.Codealaysis" fails in Net6 but works in 7 #78349
  • [Intellisense doc] System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close #78348
  • Websocket data received sometimes has an extra "}" at the end in .NET 7 #78345
  • Re-enable illink tests which rely on checked-in binaries #78344
  • Runtime should have a source-generated, trim/AOT-compatible XUnit runner #78342
    8.0.0
  • Polymorphic deserialization requires disriminator property order to be first in json. #78338
  • NativeAOT ignores PdbFile compiler option #78337
  • Use runtime build infrastructure for tools.illink subset #78334
    8.0.0
  • System.InvalidOperationException: Unable to build IHost with Minimal API on ASP.NET 6 #78332
  • `Interop.CheckedAccess.cs` is unused #78328
  • [API Proposal]: Add CutAll method #78324
  • [gcstress] HardwareIntrinsics timing out on osx-arm64 and linux-arm #78323
  • [pgo] Assertion failed 'tree == stmt->GetRootNode()' during 'Optimize layout' #78322
    8.0.0
  • SerialPort ReadByte() does not longer raise the documented TimeoutException (after timeout reached) #78319
  • String support in EnumerableTryGetNonEnumeratedCount and Enumerable.Count #78317
  • TimeSpan.FromSeconds(Double) precision is inconsistent with the document #78315
  • DI: Hangs instead of throwing exception on circular dependency #78327
  • .NET 7: incorrect order of arguments when calling the `ConfigurationDebugViewContext` constructor #78306
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Flag to disable TLS Resume/Session Caching in SslStream #78305
  • JIT, SIMD Intrinsics: Recognize `~A & B` as `VectorXxx.AndNot(B, A)` #78303
    Future
  • Canceling the `PosixSignal.SIGTSTP` does not seem to be handled correctly #78302
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices.WindowsServiceHelpers.IsWindowsService() throws exception #78301
  • Throw helper methods that just construct exceptions get inlined #78300
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.ComplexTests.Reciprocal(real: 0, imaginary: -1) #78298
    8.0.0

Closed

  • plugin - dll not in bin directory #78220
  • TimeZoneInfo.IsAmbiguousTime incorrect result when passed a Local time from a different time zone #78347
  • Use common reflection sources for illink codebase #78335
  • [release/7.0] CI failure: RsaCryptRoundtrip_OaepSHA256 CryptographicException "Unknown error" #78336
  • [API Proposal]: Implement AES OCB mode #78309
  • Socket multicast loopback does not work on IPv6 sockets on Linux #78275
  • dotnet workload install wasm-tools failed because of missing package #77494
  • Test failure global::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Fma_Vector128.Program.MultiplyAddSubtractSingle() #78299
    8.0.0
  • [.Net7] Json deserialization regression: The value of the '$id' metadata property '93' conflicts with an existing identifier. Path: $... | LineNumber: ... | BytePositionInLine: .... #78132
  • Inherited Gtk.Window failed on Dotnet 7 Native AOT #78307
  • JIT: Bad codegen - using wrong var for field access #78310
    8.0.0
  • ParamName of ArgumentNullException for new FileInfo is incorrect in .NET 7 #78224
    8.0.0
  • simd-intrinsics.c:2149, condition `size' not met #78290
  • iOS: the AOT compiler crashes in .NET 8 #78154
  • Native AOT broken in Android-arm64 #76983
    Future
  • [wasm] `dotnet-runtime-perf` pipeline completely broken #77883
    8.0.0
  • Generic custom attributes don't work #78200
    7.0.x
  • Restore failure due to `The process cannot access the file x because it is being used by another process` #77364

PullRequests

Created

  • Trigger AVX-512 pipeline on PRs, not merges #78351
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Adding check on R2RDump #78343
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Replacing exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Handle zero value modulus for OpenSSL 1.1 #78339
    area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0] Bump 6.0.12 #78331
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Use zero register in csel when possible #78330
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Rework the implementation of __arglist to be platform ind… #78329
  • Fix CreateDirectory exception in crossgen2 #78321
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Revert don't need to escape special characters anymore #78320
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix handling generic custom attributes #78304
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Revert "[release/7.0] Allow interop resolvers to return self handle" #78313
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix justMyCode behavior #78216
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] Fixing memory ordering issue in ConcurrentQueue #78178
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] Fix bug in String.Equals unrolling for CJK single-char strings #78234
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] React to CheckForOverflowUnderflow in regex source generator #78256
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Forcing auto binding redirects on Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.Tests to fix test issue. #78250
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Fix Equals in hot reload scenario #78258
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.x
  • Fix handling generic custom attributes #78297
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • fix MulticastLoopback option for IPv6 #78285
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-linux, os-mac-os-x
  • Removing obsolete references to 'emitMaxTmpSize' #78199
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unused method on CngKey #78289
    area-System.Security
  • Add a VN-based dead store removal phase #77990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Longer timeout for Interpreter run #78311
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Check layout equality of GT_OBJ/GT_BLK nodes in GenTree::Compare #78312
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix argument exception names in File/DirectoryInfo #78239
    area-System.IO
  • Arm64: Support additional condition checks in select nodes #78223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Number block assignments normally #77690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix some asserts caused by #78182. #78291
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Fix a crash when emitting P_OBJC_GET_SELECTOR opcodes. #78215
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Revert "Allocate boxed static structs on Frozen Object Heap and remov… #78296
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Initial JIT test merging #78259
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify managed runtime type name parsers #78283
    area-System.Reflection
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use DOTNET_EnableCrashReport to create dumps #77578
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reflection context tests working #77999
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for CV path. #78044
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Don't escape accented letters #78217
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [PERF] Fix mono dotnet creation #78257
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [hot_reload] Add instance fields #76462
    area-EnC-mono
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Improve the handling of Create, CreateScalar, and CreateScalarUnsafe for vectors #78236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 to 6.0 take 2 #78247
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Linker into runtime2 #78077
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [MONO] Move Marshal-ilgen into a component #75542
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use helpers for implicit casts in importer #78279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Remove the dotnet (1) man page #78229
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Mono musl support (backport #76500) #78273
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix justMyCode behavior #78066
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Change regMask_enum and regMaskTP to unsigned __int64_t on AMD64. #77571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Mono musl support (backport #76500) #78274
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Allow interop resolvers to return self handle #78004
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono] Force AOT+interpreter for iOSSimulator arm64 library test local build #76551
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - Minor optimizations for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Various support changes and cleanups for the jiterpreter PR #78225
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add HashTo/GetCurrentHashAs{UInt32/64} methods #78075
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make JIT<->EE printing methods consistent and support nested classes when printing class names #76505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes, do_jit_call, and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • add README files for Microsoft.Win32.* #78248
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • [JIT] Cleanup, share more code between x86 and x64 in `genAllocLclFrame` #76647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification #77386
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Prefer OutputRid over PackageRID for output artifacts. #76871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Initial support for unloadable ALCs #77399
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Cache allregs to avoid checking the type repeatedly #76850
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix too wide loads on arm64 for small structs #76341
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fixes around virtual method hierarchy validation #78157
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove hard_limit_for_bookkeeping #77480
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Equalize committed space in free regions and move regions to global free list #77597
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add support for dehydrated runtime data structures #77884
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ArgOutOfRangeException throw helpers #78222
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move the `[With|Get]Element(SIMD)` folding to local morph #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reserve memory for FOH in-range #78292
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix support for generic custom attributes. #78091
    area-VM-meta-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Resetting history for feature/NativeAOT branch #2083
  • NativeAOT webapi use webservice System.PlatformNotSupportedException: Dynamic code generation is not supported on this platform. #2032

Updated

  • [Bug] [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Unable to compile native WebAssembly library #2073
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM, WASM] Disable Reflection, IL scanner, RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds #1992

PullRequests

Created

  • NatvieAOT-LLVM: Update the image for prepare-signed-artifacts.yml #2087
  • Fix Yield again #2086

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable `lvaTableDump` for WASM #2084
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enhance dumps, enable LIR checking, implement `FLOAT` returns #2082
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: add a dependency for the constructed eetype for newobj #2081

Updated

  • Filament/prolog debug #2069
    area-green-threads
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Process blocks in SSA dominance to fix CSE mapping issue #2042
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] To support helper functions that return structs.... #1874
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Dont overwrite shadow stack in filters and finally blocks #1888
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: enable the fallback TypeSystemThrowingILEmitter method #1975
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • Patched Fields Branch #1938
    area-AssemblyBuilderSave
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable support for WASI SDK #1850
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update template metadata for net8.0 #29059
  • On Windows, FileVersionInfo OriginalFilename of a self-contained application should reflect the published file name #29055

Closed

  • Creating a NuGet package with `dotnet build` command on a project targeting .NET 7 with no other dependencies results in an error. #29053
  • `dotnet test` loses `/p:Property=Value` command line arguments at SDK 7.0.100 #29066
  • Blazor Server Apps packed into a Tool can't find static assets #28881
  • Android Release : MainPage = new NavigationPage(new ContentPage()); crashes #28880
  • Workload installation failed: No space left on device #28962
    Discussion
  • `dotnet test` does not seem to pass properties to MSBuild anymore #29060

PullRequests

Created

  • Add error when specifying --output option for a solution #29065
    Area-CLI
  • Use CodeAnalysis.Simplification to expand and reduce generated subtrees. Add tests to cover CSharpFileBuilder and CSharpSyntaxWriter classes. #29058
    Area-GenAPI
  • [release/7.0.1xx] ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined. (#28380) #29052
    Area-ReadyToRun

Merged

  • Ignore outdated workload manifest ID #29035
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads
  • Include ijwhost in DesignerRuntimeImplementationProjectOutputGroupOutput #28929
    Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29039
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify output testing #28994
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix TargetPlatformVersion normalization for Windows #29009
    Servicing-rejected
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29020
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Fix templating support for multiple parameters with same prefix #29027
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #28963
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29011
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2044742 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Clean up Razor Server pid file if the path doesn't exist #29029
    Area-CLI
  • Add new option for json output of dotnet list package to release 7.2.xx branch #29017
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined (backport #28380) #28782
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Allow [AsyncMethodBuilder(...)] on methods #1407
    10.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Create roles-2022-11-10.md #6708

Merged

  • Nullability improvements notes 2022-11-07 #6674

Updated

  • Clarify lambda defaults/`params` breaking change langversion #6682
  • ref struct working group notes #6691

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No completion for parameter names inside `nameof` in attributes #65419
  • when a function includes both a ref and out parameter CS8352 is now thrown #65417
  • Analyzer / generator shadow load directory needs to be per user on Unix #65415
    17.5
  • CI: Analyzer tests are never run on Linux #65412
  • Make ReferenceLocation.IsWrittenTo public #65408
  • Warning about null value while value is set as not null #65406
  • Add IDExxx rule for converting multiline string to raw string #65405
  • Pasting properly formatted code breaks formatting #65404
  • `var` keyword colorized on the case `scoped var refStruct = expr;` #65403

Closed

  • Semantic snippets: in async context `cw` snippet produces code that is not getting simplified #64923
    Backlog
  • IDE0052 is incorrectly reported for a member referenced by nameof(...) #65379
    17.5
  • `CheckFeatureAvailability` should not have side-effects on binding via `hasErrors` in `ForEachLoopBinder` #65363
    17.5
  • No Public API for top-level nullability of members #64123
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix reading indent style and indent size from VS settings #65420
    Area-IDE
  • Clarify breaking change for safe-to-escape of ref struct returned from method invocation #65418
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Move SRM to 6.0.1 #65416
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.5
  • List breaking changes in .NET 8 #65414
    Area-Compilers
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65413
    Area-Compilers
  • Prepare lambda defaults/`params` for merging to `main` #65409
    Area-Compilers
  • Work some 'scoped' issues on IDE #65407
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Semantic snippets - don't need to add fully qualified name in syntax generation #65318
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Prevent FileNotFoundException #65402
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65421
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65422
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65370
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Complete all foreach binding checks despite LangVer check #65366
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #65400
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Semantic Snippets - else snippet #65178
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.5 #65374
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main-vs-deps back to main #65373
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • Improve `NormalizeWhitespace` for object initializers #65249
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Pass in HostServices when creating the LSP server #65384
    Area-IDE
  • Fix flaky test #65383
    Area-IDE
  • Report structural lambda `params` errors #64960
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix reading indent style and indent size from VS settings #65382
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Document defaults/`params` delegate type inference breaking change #65300
    Area-Compilers
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers, Blocked
  • Report analyzer telemetry for lightbulb code path in OOP #65212
    Area-Analyzers
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #65385
    Area-Compilers
  • Enhance rule metadata and suppression info in SARIF V2 errorlog #64277
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 7 Blazor WASM authentication back button history behavior still problematic with 3rd party IDP #45097
  • Blazor Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'obj') #45096
  • .Net 7 - Json Serialization Case issue #45094
  • Resolve ambiguous parameter name `context` using the closest one #45092
  • Allow QuickGrid columns to be put in user-defined razor components. #45088
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Connections.ConnectionResetException #45086
  • WithSummary and WithDescription deson't work in minimal api #45082
  • Blazor: Navigation.BaseUri Incorrect on Forwarded Ports #45081
  • ASP .NET CORE Custom Middleware #45080
  • There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm'. #45078
  • Update template metadata for net8 #45077
  • UsePathBase does not work as expected in .NET 6 #45076
  • Net7 Blazor webassembly does not work with dotnet watch #45074
  • [.net 7] Inject HostedService into another HostedService? #45071
  • Conflicting assembly reference causing the application to break #45068
    Discussions
  • IHttpContextAccessor.HttContext Session throws Exception when not enabled #45067

Closed

  • Kestrel picks a docker generated certificate 'in front' of a generated developer certificate #44685
  • Documentation for NavigationManager.RedirectToLogin suggests it performs log out #45089
  • DefaultAuthenticationConfigurationProvider has new dependency on IConfiguration #44966
    8.0-preview1
  • App fails to process request and returns 503/404 when URL has more than 1 slash #42751
    6.0.12
  • Blazor WebAssembly KeyboardEventArgs keys Unidentified on mobile browsers #45046
  • Unhandled exception rendering component: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'insertBefore') #45034
  • QuickGrid: Cant Add AuthorizeView inside TemplateColumn #45057
  • QuickGrid: when navigating from the page hosting the grid , it calls grid Items , casing "A second operation was started on this context instance before ..." #45059
  • [BUG] Quick grid does not render in .net 7 blazor server project. #45061
  • Add HttpConnectAttribute #43501
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ERROR java.security.cert.CertificateException: java.security.cert.CertPathValidatorException: Trust anchor for certification path not found #44837
  • CSS Isolation: ability to use root scope #45072
  • Upgrading from 6.0.11 to Microsoft.Aspnetcore.Signalr.Client 7.0 introduced System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException #45012
  • Blazor server .net template not work on ios safari #44914
  • Perf regression: fortunes, multiple_queries, plaintext_actix #45020

PullRequests

Created

  • Support checking for required members in minimal APIs #45084
  • Endpoint filter pipeline now returns EmptyHttpResult in case of 400 BadRequest #45073
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Nullable cleanup #43451
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Annotate WebAssembly.Authentication for nullability #43442
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Fix predicate evaluation in OutputCacheAttribute #45027
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime
  • Fixed docs in NavigationManagerExtensions suggesting login operations perform logouts #45090
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Don't require configuration for Auth #45095
    area-security, 8.0-preview1
  • [6.0] Restore IISServerSetupFilter server type check #45036
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.12
  • [release/7.0] Add init-nuget workaround back #45091
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.1
  • [7.0] Match strangely formatted PathBase in HttpSys & IIS #42751 #45008
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • [main] Match strangely formatted PathBase in HttpSys & IIS #42751 #45011
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `57bf5a0` to `8c9078b` #45069
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Workaround linker regression #45028
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Bump socket.io-parser from 4.0.4 to 4.0.5 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #44985
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 8.0-preview1
  • Bump minimatch from 3.0.4 to 3.1.2 in /src/Components/WebAssembly/WebAssembly.Authentication/src/Interop #45054
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 8.0-preview1
  • Bump minimatch from 3.0.4 to 3.1.2 in /src/Components/WebAssembly/Authentication.Msal/src/Interop #45055
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a4f02ef` to `912db74` #45070
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add OnPrepareResponseAsync #45062
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wrong height for multi-line Label under certain conditions #11358
  • Create window level platform specific for SetWindowSoftInputModeAdjust #11355
    Backlog
  • MediaPicker.Default.CapturePhotoAsync missing important option like SaveToAlbum, PhotoSize, CompressionQuality #11353
  • IOS Content and Controls inside Frame not Showing #11351
  • CarouselView RTL hangs #11350
  • iOS app crashes after launch for release build distributed via TestFlight #11349
  • Xcode 14.1 not compatible whit VS 2022 #11348
  • android application with testOnly option set to true can't be deployed #11345
  • Picker on windows not load in MVVM #11343
  • Error : Could not find a valid Xcode app bundle at '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools' #11339
    Backlog
  • Android-.NET6-Style issue when changing the button status (disabled->enabled) #11336
  • [iOS] ImageButton in FlexLayout not clickable #11335
  • App.Current.Resources.MergedDictionaries.Add Unavailable switch the second time #11334
  • iOS The type initializer for 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Shapes.Shape' threw an exception. on latest .NET 7 #11333
  • Provide access to current map zoom level #11332
    Backlog
  • After updating Application.Current.MainPage, navigation to other pages doesn't work #11330
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Android] If MainPage overrides OnBackButtonPressed, OnBackButtonPressed and Android back button stop being called for other pages #10561
  • VS will no longer create a useable Maui project #11061
  • Allow Android archiving for both Apk and Aab formats #11077
  • .NET MAUI RC 2 app using SaxonCS NuGet library runs fine on Windows but crashes with "[libc] Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1 (SEGV_MAPERR)" on Android #6811
    Backlog
  • Error while trying to run sample app for first time #9467
  • Problem with publishing app to Apple App Store - Asset validation failed (90171) #8701
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Can't run my MAUI program on an android emulator #11249

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unnecessary MeasureOverride from RefreshView; #11357
  • Set window soft input via window mapper #11356
  • Fix iOS/macOS Images not cropped inside of a Frame #6580 #11352
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Add debug agent info #11347
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix crash disconnecting the IndicatorView #11346
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, version/android-13

Merged

  • Merge net7.0 into main #11290
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • restore unittests for native views binding #11341

Updated

  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • [Tizen] Add Label TextType #11103
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Try creating workload packs instead #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • Fix up the Shipped/Unshipped APIs #11289
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Clean up the files in the xml-docs artifacts #11257
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Vibrate - Detect zero duration and return early #11314
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Add basic Android automated accessiblity testing #11097
    area/testing
  • Bump Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces from 6.0.0 to 7.0.0 #11193
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump System.Text.Json from 6.0.6 to 7.0.0 #11190

  • CodeQL only on main/non-public builds #11273
